name: VR_Experiment_1
description:
I am experimenting with the openXR implementation in unreal engine. In this prototype you get to control a flying machine using motion controls.

I am interesten in how openXR works with different Headsets and controllers. If you´d like to help, please let me know about any issues you may have faced when trying out the prototype, aswell as what kind of VR hardware you are using.

Also let me know what you think about the flightcontrols, im thinking about making a full game using a similar approach in the future :)
